net.digital_alexandria.lvm4j.markovmodel

Class HMM

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.digital_alexandria.lvm4j.markovmodel.HMM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiscreteStateMarkovModel

    public final class HMM
extends Object
implements DiscreteStateMarkovModel
    Central HMM class, that contains states, transitions etc.
    Author:
    Simon Dirmeier s@simon-dirmeier.net

    • Method Detail

      • train

        public void train(Map<String,String> states,
                  Map<String,String> observations)
        Train the HMM using two files: a file of observations and a file of latent states that emit these observations.
        Specified by:
        train in interface DiscreteStateMarkovModel
        Parameters:
        states - a mapping from the id of a state to the real state sequence
        observations - a mapping from the id of an observation to the real observations sequence

      • predict

        public Map<String,String> predict(Map<String,String> y)
        Predict the most probable latent state sequence using a sequence of observations. Prediciton is done using the viterbi algorithm.
        Specified by:
        predict in interface DiscreteStateMarkovModel
        Parameters:
        y - a mapping from the id of an observation to the real observations sequence
        Returns:
        returns a map the predicted states for given sequences

        public final double[][] logEmissionMatrix()
        Returns the log-transformed stochastic matrix of emissions, i.e. what probabilities do single emissions have for a nodes.

        returns a matrix

        public final double[][] emissionMatrix()

      • logTransitionMatrix

        public final double[][] logTransitionMatrix()
        Returns the log-transformed stochastic matrix of transitions, i.e. what probabilties does a transition have given a hidden state.
        Returns:
        returns a matrix

        public double[][] transitionMatrix()
